law.catch_line: Notwithstanding the provisions of §§ 6-102, 7-211, and 7-401 of the Tax - Property Article, for al...
law.text: Notwithstanding the provisions of §§ 6-102, 7-211, and 7-401 of the Tax - Property Article, for all private development that is not related to aviation on State-owned land at Baltimore-Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport in Anne Arundel County, the State shall reimburse Anne Arundel County on a yearly basis a sum of money that is agreed upon by the Secretary of Transportation and the Anne Arundel County Executive and does not exceed an amount equal to the appropriate local property taxes that the private development would have paid to Anne Arundel County if the private development was not constructed on State-owned land.
